name: Prospective application
text:
[§489E-4]  Prospective application.  This chapter shall apply to any electronic record or electronic signature created, generated, sent, communicated, or received on or after June 28, 2000. [L 2000, c 282, pt of §1]
 
Revision Note
 
  "June 28, 2000" substituted for "the effective date of this chapter".
